subject: i just turned around and went home
body:
i'm thankful that i left the house for a run and a block later it started raining and rather than seeing if i could wait it out two blocks later i just turned around and went home (where it continued to rain).

i'm thankful i had a good facetime call with my parents.

i'm thankful for biscuits.
normalized_markdown:

i'm thankful i had a good facetime call with my parents.

i'm thankful for biscuits.
